Topic.Title: Why is she keeping it a secret on how much we paid for Stamped?

Message.Msg: If the purchase price is not material to the company (Yahoo) then it doesn't need to be disclosed. You should hope that the price wasn't material since MM intends to shut the product down and use the talent elsewhere. If the price is material and they report it in an SEC filing over the next few days then you will know that Yahoo shareholders just bailed Justine Bieber and Ryan Seacrest among others out of their failed investment.

Message.Title: Jacob Fund CEO Picks Yahoo!
Message.Msg: Jacob very positive on Yahoo. “We’ve stuck with Yahoo for a while,” he said, adding that the reason wasn’t because of huge upside. “We thought the risk was extremely low.” New CEO Marissa Mayer also garnered praise, and Jacob said that her success at the company would mean one thing: “Yahoo could be a huge winner.”
